content: sts decrease 1 skip 1 stitch chain 1 *ps in next st skip repeat from * to end of round slip_stitch to join 1 st chain 1 repeat from * to end of round 48 slip_stitch in 3rd chain of chain 4 to join r18 19 20 - chain 3 double_crochet in same st and next r9 - chain 1 single_crochet in same st *single_crochet in chain 1 st decrease *double_crochet in next 2 sts decrease repeat space single_crochet in top of ps repeat from * to from * to end of round slip_stitch to join 36 end of round slip_stitch to join 72 84 96 r19 20 21 - chain 3 double_crochet in same st decrease r10 - chain 3 double_crochet in same stitch and each *double_crochet in next st decrease repeat from * to end stitch around slip_stitch to join 72 84 96 of round slip_stitch to join 24 r11 - chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch and each st r20 21 22 - chain 3 decrease 12 times slip_stitch to around slip_stitch to join 72 84 96 join 12 r12 - chain 3 *skip 1 st double_crochet in next st cross behind double_crochet in skipped st repeat from * f/o and use yarn tail to weave in and out of to end of round slip_stitch to join stitches pull tight to close the gap knot r13 - chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch and each st off and weave in end around slip_stitch to join 72 84 96 r14 - chain 3 double_crochet in same stitch and each stitch around slip_stitch to join 72 84 96 r15 - chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch and each st around slip_stitch to join 72 84 96 decreasing rounds size youth/adult only r16 - chain 3 double_crochet in same st and next 5 sts decrease *double_crochet in next 6 sts decrease repeat from * to end of round slip_stitch to join 84 copyright by amy taylor -
